content: How can I incorporate sustainability into my Fluid Mechanics course?

Based on my search through sustainability research, here's what I found about your query: **How can I incorporate sustainability into my Fluid Mechanics course?**

**Source 1**: sustainability rating systems,” ICSI 2014 Creat. Infrastruct. a Sustain. World - Proc. 2014 Int. Conf. Sustain. Infrastruct., no. 1, pp. 972–984, 2014, doi: 10.1061/9780784478745.091. **Source 3**: methods; with the greatest frequency being departmental introductory courses. In mechanical engineering, the lower division courses include: first year seminar, research and innovation lab, thermal systems, seminar for underserved communities/humanitarian engineering, and intro to design. These findings are drawn from academic research on sustainability in engineering education.
